section.name: Differential analysis results annotation step
section.p: This step allow to add additional annotations to differential analysis result files and create files in TSV, ODS or XLSX formats. This step works like the expression annotation step and will process all the files in output directory that matches with the diffana_*.tsv pattern.

ul.li: Available: Both local and distributed mode

Input ports:
additionalannotation: additional annotation file in TSV format (format: additional_annotation_tsv)

tr.td: One or more format name for the output separated by a comma.

ul.pre: <!-- Additional annotation for differential analysis --> <step skip="false"> <name>diffanaresultsannotation</name> <parameters> <parameter> <name>outputformat</name> <value>xlsx</value> </parameter> </parameters> </step>
